title: Feature request - add Copy to Clipboard button
body: Use e.g. clipboard.js (https://clipboardjs.com/), as I did for https://github.com/rmzelle/ref-extractor.

title: Feature request - customizable line wrapping
body: It might be nice to have a checkbox that allows the user to enable line wrapping (with a text field to specify the number of characters per line, e.g. 80).

title: Feature request - add casing options
body: Currently casing is preserved, but it might be nice to offer a toggle to upper case and lower case.

title: Update to Bootstrap 4
body: Might be able to use http://upgrade-bootstrap.bootply.com/, but it would be helpful if bootlint would be available for v4, which apparently is still a work in progress: https://github.com/twbs/bootlint/issues/304
